text: Ezɨ Amorian atrivir Jordanɨn Fanemɨn aruem uaghiri naghɨn itiba, ko Kenanian atrivir Mediterenianɨn Ongarir Ekiamɨn mɨriamɨn itiba, uaghan kamagh oraki, Ikiavɨra Itir God Israelia bagha Jordanɨn Fanem gamizɨ, a dakezɨ, me vongɨn ghue. Bizir kam me gamizɨ, me Israelian atiatia naviba me ginivima, agharapaniba bar men amɨrazɨ me iti.
